Posts.Content: Hi I haven’t got any lumps but the pains in my breast and especially when it’s in my shoulder blade it’s so painful also pain goes down my arm like a numb pain , I’ve been fobbed off at docs for weeks well even months saying I must of pulled  a muscle or said it might be a infection  I went back last Thursday I had a locum doctor he said straight away I’m referring you to Breast clinic to get sorted out and I’ve appointment next Friday the 2nd feb x
Posts.Title: Pains shoulder blade

Posts.Content: Hi I’m new to this group I keep getting pain in my breast and it goes through to my shoulder blade which is very painful and then my arm goes numb, I’ve got appointment at breast clinic but I’m getting worried has anyone suffered the same ?
